verses.text: Then we \w turned|strong="H6437"\w*, and took our \w journey|strong="H5265"\w* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto me: and we \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
Ye have \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* this \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* long \w enough|strong="H7227"\w*: \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* you \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*.

And \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thou the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye \add are\add* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, which \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*; and they shall be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of you: take ye \w good|strong="H3966"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* unto yourselves therefore:

\w Meddle|strong="H1624"\w* not with them; for I will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you of their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, no, not so much as a \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w breadth|strong="H4096"\w*; because I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* unto \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \add for\add* a \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*.\f + \fr 2.5 \ft no…: Heb. even to the treading of the sole of the foot\f*

Ye shall \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w meat|strong="H0400"\w* of them for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, that ye may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; and ye shall also \w buy|strong="H3739"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of them for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, that ye may \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thee in all the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w walking|strong="H3212"\w* through this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: these \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add hath been\add* with thee; thou hast \w lacked|strong="H2637"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w*.

And when we \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* by from our \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, through the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* from \w Elath|strong="H0359"\w*, and from \w Ezion-gaber|strong="H6100"\w*, we \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Distress|strong="H6696"\w* not the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*, neither \w contend|strong="H1624"\w* with them in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: for I will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee of their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add for\add* a \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*; because I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \add for\add* a \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft Distress…: or, Use no hostility against Moab\f*

The \w Emims|strong="H0368"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein in times \w past|strong="H6440"\w*, a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, and \w tall|strong="H7311"\w*, as the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w*;

\w Which|strong="H1992"\w* also were \w accounted|strong="H2803"\w* \w giants|strong="H7497"\w*, as the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w*; but the \w Moabites|strong="H4125"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* them \w Emims|strong="H0368"\w*.

The \w Horims|strong="H2752"\w* also \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w beforetime|strong="H6440"\w*; but the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w succeeded|strong="H3423"\w* them, when they had \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in their stead; as \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of his \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 2.12 \ft succeeded: Heb. inherited\f*\f + \fr 2.12 \ft stead: or, room\f*

Now rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \add said I\add*, and get you \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Zered|strong="H2218"\w*. And we went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Zered|strong="H2218"\w*.\f + \fr 2.13 \ft brook: or, valley\f*

And the \w space|strong="H3117"\w* in which we \w came|strong="H1980"\w* from \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w*, until we were come \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Zered|strong="H2218"\w*, \add was\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*; until all the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* were wasted \w out|strong="H8552"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 2.14 \ft brook: or, valley\f*

For indeed the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was against them, to \w destroy|strong="H2000"\w* them from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, until they were \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*.

¶ So it came to pass, when all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* were \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* and \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,
That the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
Thou art to pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* through \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w*, the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

And \add when\add* thou comest \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w distress|strong="H6696"\w* them not, nor \w meddle|strong="H1624"\w* with them: for I will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* \add any\add* \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*; because I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Lot|strong="H3876"\w* \add for\add* a \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*.

(That also was \w accounted|strong="H2803"\w* a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w giants|strong="H7497"\w*: \w giants|strong="H7497"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein in old \w time|strong="H6440"\w*; and the \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* them \w Zamzummims|strong="H2157"\w*;\f + \fr 2.20 \ft Zamzummims: also called, Zuzims\f*

A \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, and \w tall|strong="H7311"\w*, as the \w Anakims|strong="H6062"\w*; but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them; and they \w succeeded|strong="H3423"\w* them, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in their stead:

As he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, when he \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* the \w Horims|strong="H2752"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them; and they \w succeeded|strong="H3423"\w* them, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in their stead even unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

And the \w Avims|strong="H5761"\w* which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Hazerim|strong="H2699"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w Azzah|strong="H5804"\w*, the \w Caphtorims|strong="H3732"\w*, which came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Caphtor|strong="H3731"\w*, \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* them, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in their stead.)

¶ Rise ye \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, take your \w journey|strong="H5265"\w*, and pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*: \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \add it\add*, and \w contend|strong="H1624"\w* with him in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 2.24 \ft begin…: Heb. begin, possess\f*

This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w dread|strong="H6343"\w* of thee and the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of thee upon the \w nations|strong="H6440"\w* \add that are\add* under the whole \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, who shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w report|strong="H8088"\w* of thee, and shall \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w*, and be in \w anguish|strong="H2342"\w* because of \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*.

¶ And I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* out of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Kedemoth|strong="H6932"\w* unto \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* with \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Let me \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* along by the high \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, I will neither \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* unto the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* nor to the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

Thou shalt \w sell|strong="H7666"\w* me \w meat|strong="H0400"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, that I may \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, that I may \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*: only I will pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* on my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*;

(As the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* which \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, and the \w Moabites|strong="H4125"\w* which \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w*, \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto me;) until I shall pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* us.

But \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not let us \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* by him: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and made his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w obstinate|strong="H0553"\w*, that he might \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* him into thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, as \add appeareth\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w begun|strong="H2490"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* and his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w*, that thou mayest \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
Then \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* us, he and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H4421"\w* at \w Jahaz|strong="H3096"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us; and we \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And we \w took|strong="H3920"\w* all his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, and utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* the \w men|strong="H4962"\w*, and the \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and the little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, of every \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, we \w left|strong="H7604"\w* none to \w remain|strong="H8300"\w*:\f + \fr 2.34 \ft the men…: Heb. every city of men, and women, and little ones\f*
Only the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* we took for a \w prey|strong="H0962"\w* unto ourselves, and the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which we \w took|strong="H3920"\w*.

From \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w brink|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, and \add from\add* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that \add is\add* by the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*, even unto \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, there was not one \w city|strong="H7151"\w* too \w strong|strong="H7682"\w* for us: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* all unto \w us|strong="H6440"\w*:

Only unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* thou \w camest|strong="H7126"\w* not, \add nor\add* unto any \w place|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Jabbok|strong="H2999"\w*, nor unto the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, nor unto whatsoever the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w forbad|strong="H6680"\w* us.
